message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $140. I think you'll really love it!
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate it, but I'm looking to stay within my budget. Would you consider selling the product for $120?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I need to make a profit. I can offer you a compromise - how about $130?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $125 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our needs.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. I'm willing to go up to $135, but that's as high as I can go. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll really love the product!
